title: Blondy's Big Dino Day
backCoverBlurb: Blondy is a dinosaur expert! Join her as she discovers a magical world of friendly prehistoric friends, with big stomps, loud roars, and lost of fun.
characterDescription: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. She has a wide, happy and energetic smile. She is wearing a bright red t-shirt under blue denim overalls.

pages.text: Blondy was playing with her toy dinosaurs. Stomp, stomp! went the big T-Rex. Can you stomp like a dino?
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is wearing her red shirt and denim overalls and is stomping on a colorful rug with a toy dinosaur.

pages.text: Suddenly, a magical light came from her big dino book. Sparkle! Everything started to change.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is looking into an open book that is glowing with a bright, magical white light in her room.

pages.text: Blondy was in a huge forest with giant green leaves. It felt so warm and smelled like rain.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is standing among enormous ferns and tall, leafy trees under a bright sun.

pages.text: She saw a real T-Rex! Rawr! it said with a friendly smile. He was big and scaly.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. A giant, friendly green T-Rex is looking down at Blondy, who is smiling up at him without fear.

pages.text: Blondy gave the T-Rex a gentle pat on his bumpy nose. It felt interesting and cool.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is reaching out to touch the snout of the large dinosaur, looking curious and happy.

pages.text: She met a Triceratops named Toby. He had three smooth, white horns. Point to the horns!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is standing next to a Triceratops and pointing at its horns with a big smile.

pages.text: Toby gave Blondy a ride. Bump, bump, bump! It was like a bouncy car.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is sitting on the back of the Triceratops, holding on and laughing as it walks.

pages.text: They saw a blue lake with splashing water. Splish! Small dinosaurs were playing there.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is looking at a group of small dinosaurs by a clear, blue lake under a bright sky.

pages.text: The dino world was full of amazing sights and sounds. Blondy felt like a real explorer.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is looking through a pair of toy binoculars at the prehistoric landscape, looking empowered.

pages.text: It was time to go back. The magical light appeared again. Whoosh! She was back in her room.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is sitting back on her rug, looking a bit surprised and holding her book.

pages.text: Blondy waved bye-bye to her new friends. I will visit you again soon! she whispered.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is waving at the pictures in her book with a sweet, happy expression.

pages.text: She closed her eyes and dreamed of the big stomps and loud roars. Goodnight, Blondy. Sleep tight.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. A peaceful image of Blondy sleeping in her bed with her toy dinosaurs nearby.
